mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM goods WHERE goods_code = #{goodsCode};

SELECT g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,cm.category_medium_name ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_color ,g.goods_size FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN category_medium AS cm ON g.category_medium_code = cm.category_medium_code
${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.category_medium_code ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_color ,g.goods_size ,g.goods_reg_date ,g.goods_sangse ,g.goods_image ,g.fabric ,g.rate ,g.upcycling_carbon_dioxide_emission_level FROM goods AS g

SELECT g.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_color ,g.goods_size ,u.goods_code ,u.factory_goods_price ,u.goods_price FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN goods_unit_price_info AS u ON g.goods_code = u.goods_code
${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goods_code, goods_name, category_medium_code, goods_price, goods_color, goods_size, goods_reg_date, goods_sangse, goods_image, fabric, rate, upcycling_carbon_dioxide_emission_level) VALUES (sf_new_goods_code(), #{goodsName}, #{categoryMediumCode}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsColor}, #{goodsSize}, NOW(), #{goodsSangse}, #{goodsImage}, #{fabric}, #{rate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(g.fabric, ':', 1) FROM goods AS g WHERE g.goods_code = sf_select_goods_code()
SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(g.fabric, ':', -1) FROM goods AS g WHERE g.goods_code = sf_select_goods_code()
SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(g.rate, ':', 1) FROM goods AS g WHERE g.goods_code = sf_select_goods_code()
SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(g.rate, ':', -1) FROM goods AS g WHERE g.goods_code = sf_select_goods_code()
mapper.update: UPDATE goods AS g SET upcycling_carbon_dioxide_emission_level= ${emissionLevel} WHERE g.goods_code = sf_select_goods_code()
